name: Cube Run (Boizon)
description:
NOTE: this game only works when downloaded via the itch.io app

>>TO QUIT THE GAME PRESS F3<<

control your cube with WASD - WS } rotate forward & back - AD } move side-to-side

music - Ooga by Evan King

disclaimers - 

There is one level, but this game can take up to 20 minutes to beat. Have fun!!
